title: Removing a working set immediately makes changes
description: When removing a working set, the changes associated with it are applied immediately.
OB: When I remove a working set with one project from the package view, the view is not filtered and all the files from the project are still visible.
EB: When I remove a working set with one project from the package view, the view should filter out the files from the project and they should no longer be visible.
SR:
1. Create a working set with one project and select it in the package view.
2. Open the working set dialog again and create a second working set.
3. Delete the first working set.
